fields.label: Page Show Style
fields.name: page_show_style
fields.instructions: If you don't want to show slider, navigations and want to show content in center of screen like on normal webpages - use Default preset.

fields.label: Video URL
fields.name: video_url
fields.instructions: Type Youtube or Vimeo video url

fields.label: Video Size
fields.name: video_size
fields.instructions: Type video size or aspect ratio. Examples: 16x9, 4x3, 800x600

fields.label: Active Slide
fields.name: page_slider_active_slide
fields.instructions: Select active category for slider. Make sure to active slide that placed in active category. Remove it to use default value from theme options.

fields.label: Active Category
fields.name: page_slider_active_category
fields.instructions: Select active category for slider. Remove it to use default value from theme options.

fields.label: Transition Effect
fields.name: page_slider_transition_effect
fields.instructions: Transition effect between slides.

fields.label: Transition Speed
fields.name: page_slider_transition_speed_show
fields.instructions: Transition speed for effect.

fields.label: Category Transition Effect
fields.name: page_slider_category_transition_effect
fields.instructions: Transition effect between categories.

fields.label: Category Transition Speed
fields.name: page_slider_category_transition_speed_show
fields.instructions: Transition speed for category effect.

fields.label: Force Reload Slider
fields.name: page_slider_force_reload
fields.instructions: Force reload the whole slider (slides, active slide and active category) when ajax page loaded.

fields.label: Hide Titles
fields.name: page_slider_hide_titles
fields.instructions: Hide layout titles after slider effect start.

fields.label: Custom Set of Slides
fields.name: page_slider_enable_custom_set_of_slides
fields.instructions: If you don't want to use default set of slides, you can set your own.

fields.label: Title
fields.name: page_layout_content_title_custom
fields.instructions: Big text in center of screen with main text color.

fields.label: Subtitle
fields.name: page_layout_content_subtitle_custom
fields.instructions: Mid text on left side of screen under Title.

fields.label: Type Subtitle
fields.name: page_layout_content_subtitle
fields.default_value: The Supermodels Always Bring Their Flawless Festival Style to Rio

fields.label: Tagline
fields.name: page_layout_content_tagline_custom
fields.instructions: Small text on right side of Title.

fields.label: Show Content
fields.name: page_show_content
fields.instructions: Show main content block.

fields.label: Show Default Title
fields.name: page_content_show_default_title
fields.instructions: Show current page title. Disable it If you want to add custom title in content.

fields.label: Vertical Align
fields.name: page_content_vertical_align
fields.instructions: Vertical position for content.

fields.label: Under Layout Title
fields.name: page_content_under_title
fields.instructions: Big title in center of screen will be above background of content and under content text.

fields.label: Transition In
fields.name: page_content_transition_in
fields.instructions: Show animation for content block.

fields.label: Transition Out
fields.name: page_content_transition_out
fields.instructions: Hide animation for content block.

fields.label: Custom Transition Speed
fields.name: page_content_transition_speed_custom
fields.instructions: Speed for In and Out animations.
